Articles.Content:
I have encountered this bug for a while now and it does not matter whether the install is modded or not.

Every one in a while I get a 'sticky decoupler' that simply doesn't decouple when I stage it or click 'Decouple' in the context menu. I thought that it might be a case of the acceleration wedging parts together (somehow), but a launch after revert always goes on without any problems and the decoupler decouples.

I would be thankful for any help.
